data.eml:eml: Mitrephora monocarpa (Annonaceae): a new species from Surat Thani Province, Peninsular Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saunders, Richard M. K., Chalermglin, Piya (2019): Mitrephora monocarpa (Annonaceae): a new species from Surat Thani Province, Peninsular Thailand. PhytoKeys 121: 73-80, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.121.34271, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.121.34271
